verses.text: These things \w the|strong="H3069"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w* shewed \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w me|strong="H0310"\w*: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* locust \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* \w beginning|strong="H8462"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* shooting \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* latter rain, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w lo|strong="H2009"\w*, \w it|strong="H7200"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* latter rain \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w mowing|strong="H1488"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w end|strong="H3615"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w eating|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w grass|strong="H6212"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w O|strong="H3069"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*, \w be|strong="H1961"\w* merciful, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w beseech|strong="H4994"\w* thee: \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w raise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* very \w little|strong="H6996"\w*?

\w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w pity|strong="H5162"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*: \w It|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

These things \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w* shewed \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w*: \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* judgment unto \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w deep|strong="H8415"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w ate|strong="H0398"\w* \w up|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* part \w at|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w same|strong="H0853"\w* time.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w O|strong="H3069"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*, \w cease|strong="H2308"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w beseech|strong="H4994"\w* thee, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* \w raise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w little|strong="H6996"\w* \w one|strong="H1931"\w*?

\w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w pity|strong="H5162"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*. Yea \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

These things \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* shewed \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w was|strong="H3027"\w* \w standing|strong="H5324"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* plastered \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* mason’s trowel.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* seest thou, \w Amos|strong="H5986"\w*? \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w A|strong="H7760"\w* mason’s trowel. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w lay|strong="H7760"\w* \w down|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* trowel \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* plaster \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w over|strong="H0413"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w places|strong="H1116"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w idol|strong="H3478"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* thrown \w down|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sanctuaries|strong="H4720"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w laid|strong="H8074"\w* \w waste|strong="H8074"\w*: \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w I|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* Amasias \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Amos|strong="H5986"\w* hath rebelled \w against|strong="H5921"\w* thee \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w able|strong="H3201"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* bear \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w Amos|strong="H5986"\w*: \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w carried|strong="H1540"\w* \w away|strong="H1540"\w* \w captive|strong="H1540"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* own \w land|strong="H0127"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* Amasias \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Amos|strong="H5986"\w*: Thou \w seer|strong="H2374"\w*, go, \w flee|strong="H1272"\w* \w away|strong="H1272"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Juda: \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w* \w any|strong="H5750"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Amos|strong="H5986"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Amasias: \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w am|strong="H0595"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w am|strong="H0595"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w am|strong="H0595"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w herdsman|strong="H0951"\w* plucking wild \w figs|strong="H1103"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0310"\w* \w followed|strong="H0310"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: Go, \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* thou \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: Thou sayest, thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* drop thy \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w idol|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: Thy \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w play|strong="H2181"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w land|strong="H0127"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* measured \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w line|strong="H2256"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* polluted \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w go|strong="H1540"\w* \w into|strong="H1540"\w* \w captivity|strong="H1540"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w land|strong="H0127"\w*.
